question: 専攻
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>specialty</kanji>, which you focus on with <kanji>aggression</kanji>, is your <vocabulary>major</vocabulary> in college (your <vocabulary>college major</vocabulary>). Study hard, young grasshopper.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
